name: Emergency Rescue Service
description:
Enroll with the police, ems or firefighter department and take on rescue missions unique to each service in a big city. Get behind the wheel of the police car, engage in desperate cop car chases and catch criminals on foot. Drive a rescue ambulance towards the accident site and rescue people. Gear up and drive a fire truck towards the incident place to put out lethal fires and save lives! Each emergency department has its own vehicles like a police car, fire truck, ambulance, and equipment for you to operate while on duty.

POLICE DEPARTMENT
Police are the first to respond to a crime incident, the police are equipped with the fastest cars and a variety of weapons. Drive police car around town and chase down dangerous suspects or catch criminals on foot.

FIRE DEPARTMENT
You’re part of the quick emergency response team, so get ready to respond in case of a fire emergency in a big city

EMS
As an emergency medical specialist, your job is to keep civilians safe, treat patient's injuries, diagnosis and more.

Game Features:
3 Different Modes To Play
Police, Firefighter & Ems
Spectacular Gameplay
Smooth Controls
Open World Environment

Enjoy the amazing gameplay and give us your feedback to help improve the game in future releases.
